text: Ðis sind þara XIII hide landgemæra þe to fif hidum gebyriad ærest on ydeles ige.
Of ydeles ige andlang ge mæres to þat teles wege andlang weges on mearan mores heafod andlang mænan mores heafud on eoccene up mid stræme to hudes lade of hudes lade to þære scortandic.
Of þære scortan dic on ælfðryþe dic.
Andlang dic on holan broc andlang holan broces on wasan.
Andlang wasan eft to ydeles ige.
Þonne is þæs landes ealles XIII healf hid.
